scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Massacre of the Innocents. In the foreground, a soldier in golden armor raises his sword to strike a child held by a woman in a red dress. The child, dressed in blue, is bleeding from a wound on its head. To the left, another woman in a blue dress holds a child, while a man in dark armor stands behind them, also raising a sword. In the background, a procession with a donkey carrying figures, possibly Mary and Joseph, moves past a fence. Behind them, a village with a church and houses is visible. The overall setting is outdoors, with architectural elements suggesting a town or village.
